com.telek.telekgdx.box2d

Class BodyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telek.telekgdx.box2d.BodyFactory

  • public class BodyFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates bodies that only have one fixture attached to them. Use this class to create simple physics bodies.

    • Constructor Summary
